revised_title: Rudolph Messel: A Life of Chemistry, Industry, and Scientific Contributions
tldr: The article is an obituary for Rudolph Messel, a prominent figure in the chemical industry and a significant contributor to the development of fuming acid production. Messel's work in catalysis and his impact on the alizarin industry are highlighted, as well as his dedication to science and his support for scientific research. The article also touches upon his personal life, his passion for chemistry, and his contributions to various scientific societies.
